alert.note: Alert for South Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 10:46AM MST until January 08 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches below 7500 feet with 5 to 10 inches above 7500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...South Central Mountains. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 8 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
